channel.title: SkillCapes reach level 135 u get skill cape?And silab shops?
channel.description: How would i make it so that when u get level 135 anyting. And can i make it so that once u get 135 it pops into ur inventory? And do i have to do anything to be able to sell silab items at shops???

item.title: SkillCapes reach level 135 u get skill cape?And silab shops?
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

[quote=“Phree xp, post:5, topic:170970”]case 1: // Strength sendFrame164(6206); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207); sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+playerLevel[2]+" .", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[2] >= 135) { addItem(14077, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Strength skill cape and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[2] +" strength!"); }[/quote]
Wont it need a break?{}?

Read full topic

item.title: SkillCapes reach level 135 u get skill cape?And silab shops?
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Um, we have a topic like this right on top of this one [bottem now], why not look at it rather than make a new post? Hold on I’ll edit this in a sec and help

[quote=“killer_2008, post:15, topic:170948”]YEah u can replace that one with this

case 1: // Strength sendFrame164(6206); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207); sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+playerLevel[2]+" .", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[2] >= 99) { addItem(14077, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Strength skill cape and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[2] +" strength!"); }

they will get str cape trimmed with that code gl

This is for strenght[/quote]

All from Killer_2008 so don’t thank me thank him in PM.
